name: The Bouncing Dead
description:
Be the survivor of a thrilling zombie apocalypse with bouncing-ball-firing gun as your sole survival gear. Pick the best aim to let the balls bounce and hit as many zombies as possible, that's how you survive. Upgrade your gun night by night... As the better gun ensures greater chance of survival. Keep your stand on guard until the morning sun greets you!

Let us know your survival story! Reach us via info@alegrium.com.
